K10D0095_H0096:139a-15: rtsa ba 'bras bu rnam pa mang dang bde ba
K10D0095_H0096:139a-16: kun gyis rim gro byas; ;de yis myur du khyod
K10D0095_H0096:139a-17: la gsod pa khrid 'ongs khyod kyis de la bzod
K10D0095_H0096:139a-18: // byang chub btsal phyir brtul zhugs dka' thub yon tan rnam mang ye shes la //
K10D0095_H0096:139b-0: @139b khyod kyis brtson 'grus shin tu brtan par gnas shing mi g-yo g-yo ba med //
K10D0095_H0096:139b-1: dbang sgyur bdud kyang khyod kyis brtson 'grus stobs kyis stobs ni med par byas //
K10D0095_H0096:139b-2: mi yi sengge khyod 'dir mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la da bab bo //
K10D0095_H0096:139b-3: khyod 'dir gna' sngon kha ba'i kha dog 'dra ba'i rta mchog gyur pa'i tshe //
K10D0095_H0096:139b-4: snying rje bskyed nas nam mkha' las ni srin po'i gling du myur du song //
K10D0095_H0096:139b-5: de tshe phongs shing 'dug pa'i mi de blangs te bde la rab tu bzhag /
K10D0095_H0096:139b-6: khyod kyis 'di la sogs pa brtson 'grus rnam par
K10D0095_H0096:139b-7: 'phrul ba mang po byas; ;myur du 'gyur zhing g-yo
K10D0095_H0096:139b-8: la yul la dga' zhing rgod pa'i sems brtul te
K10D0095_H0096:139b-9: // bsam gtan par gyur rdul des zhi gnas rnams kyis nyon mongs gtso bo bcom //
K10D0095_H0096:139b-10: khyod 'dir bsam gtan dga' bas rang gi yon tan dag gis 'gro don byas //
K10D0095_H0096:139b-11: da 'dir sems can mchog khyod bsam gtan rnams 'phrul bya ba'i dus la bab //
K10D0095_H0096:139b-12: gna' sngon khyod ni drang srong bsam gtan dga' zhing rab tu gnas par gyur //
K10D0095_H0096:139b-13: rgyal po med pa'i mi dag gis ni khyod khrid rgyal srid dbang yang bskur //
K10D0095_H0096:139b-14: khyod kyis skye bo dag ni dge ba bcu dang tshangs pa'i lam la bkod //
K10D0095_H0096:139b-15: de yi tshe na mi las shi 'phos thams cad tshangs pa'i gnas su dong //
K10D0095_H0096:140a-0: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'gro ba rnam @140a *//
K10D0095_H0096:140a-1: mang shes pa'i cho ga khyod rab mkhas //
K10D0095_H0096:140a-2: gzhan gyi spyod dang 'gro ba'i skad shes pa dang dbang po shes pa dang //
K10D0095_H0096:140a-3: tshul dang 'dul dang blo gros rnam mang rgyu ba'i pha rol khyod phyin gyur //
K10D0095_H0096:140a-4: rgyal po'i sras khyod 'dir ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la da bab bo //
K10D0095_H0096:140a-5: khyod kyis gna' sngon skye bo lta ba log par zhugs par gyur pa dag /
K10D0095_H0096:140a-6: rga shi sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos nyam thag 'khod pa 'di mthong nas //
K10D0095_H0096:140a-7: srid pa rnam par gzhig pa'i drang lam nyid kyis khong du chud byas te //
K10D0095_H0096:140a-8: mun pa bcom pa khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la don chen rab tu byas //
K10D0095_H0096:140a-9: tshigs bcad rnam pa mang po mdzes pa yon tan ldan pa sna tshogs 'dis //
K10D0095_H0096:140a-10: sil snyan sgra bsgrags de las rgyal ba'i gzi yis dpa' po bskul bar gyur //
K10D0095_H0096:140a-11: blo mchog ldan pa khyod 'dir mngon par 'byung ba'i dus ni da bab kyi //
K10D0095_H0096:140a-12: sdug bsngal gang ba'i skye bo 'di dag mthong nas btang snyoms ma byed cig /
K10D0095_H0096:140a-13: bud med gos dang rin po che dang do shal spos phreng sna tshogs kyis //
K10D0095_H0096:140a-14: brgyan pa dag kyang sems dang phangs pa skyes nas rab tu dga' ba rnams //
K10D0095_H0096:140a-15: sems can mchog la sil snyan rab tu sgrog cing slong bar byed pa na //
K10D0095_H0096:140b-0: rgyal ba'i mthu yis sil snyan dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di @140b 'dra byung //
K10D0095_H0096:140b-1: gang gi don du khyod kyis 'gro la phan phyir bskal pa du mar ni //
K10D0095_H0096:140b-2: gtang bar dka' ba btang zhing tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus shin tu spyad //
K10D0095_H0096:140b-3: bsam gtan shes rab shin tu bsgoms pa khyod kyi dus la da bab kyi //
K10D0095_H0096:140b-4: 'dren pa mngon par 'byung ba'i blo la myur soms phyi bshol ma byed cig /
K10D0095_H0096:140b-5: sngon chad rin chen mdzod dang gser dang dngul dang rgyan rnams rab tu btang //
K10D0095_H0096:140b-6: skye bo de dang de dag tu ni mchod sbyin rnam pa mang po byas //
K10D0095_H0096:140b-7: khyod kyi chung ma bu pho bu mo lus dang rgyal srid srog btang ste //
K10D0095_H0096:140b-8: byang chub don du gtang bar dka' ba dpag tu med pa khyod kyis btang //
K10D0095_H0096:140b-9: khyod ni rgyal po mi dman bsod nams dpal gyis rnam par grags par gyur //
K10D0095_H0096:140b-10: mu khyud 'dzin dang mu khyud nag po tshangs pas byin dang ral pa can //
K10D0095_H0096:140b-11: mchod sbyin stong ldan dang ni chos sems 'od 'phro can dang nor brtan dang //
K10D0095_H0096:140b-12: shin tu don bsam gyur te sems can dman la gtang bar dka' ba btang //
K10D0095_H0096:140b-13: zla ba'i bu dang brtson 'grus 'bar dang bsod nams 'od zer can du gyur //
K10D0095_H0096:140b-14: gtong ba che dang ldan zhing mthu ldan khyod ni byas pa gzo bar gyur //
K10D0095_H0096:140b-15: rgyal po drang srong zla ba gzugs ldan dpa' bo bden pa 'phel ba dang //
K10D0095_H0096:140b-16: rgyal po legs par smra ba tshol dang blo gros bzang dang nges par gyur //
K10D0095_H0096:141a-1: dang rdul dang phyogs kyi bdag por gyur //
K10D0095_H0096:141a-2: rab sbyin dpa' bo ka shi'i rgyal po rin chen gtsug phung zhi ba bstod //
K10D0095_H0096:141a-3: mi dbang de dag rnams dang gzhan du gyur te gtang bar dka' ba btang //
K10D0095_H0096:141a-4: khyod kyis ji ltar gtong ba'i char phab de bzhin chos kyi char pa phob //
K10D0095_H0096:141a-5: khyod kyis sngon chad sems can snying po gangg'a'i bye ma snyed cig mthong //
K10D0095_H0096:141a-6: sems can thar par bya phyir byang chub dam pa'i mchog ni tshol ba na //
K10D0095_H0096:141a-7: khyod kyis mchod pa dpag med bsam mi khyab pas sangs rgyas de dag mchod //
K10D0095_H0096:141a-8: dpa' bo grong khyer dam pa 'di nas 'byung ba'i dus la da bab bo //
K10D0095_H0096:141a-9: thog mar khyod kyis don yod mthong la s'a la'i me tog gis ni mchod //
K10D0095_H0096:141a-10: rnam par snang mdzad la ni dang ba'i sems kyis skad cig bar du bltas //
K10D0095_H0096:141a-11: rnga dbyangs ldan pa la ni khyod kyis aa ru ra yi 'bru gcig phul //
K10D0095_H0096:141a-12: tsandan mthong nas khyod kyis rtsva yi me sgron blangs te khyim du bzung //
K10D0095_H0096:141a-13: rtul po grong khyer 'jug pa mthong nas phye ma spar gang rab tu gtor //
K10D0095_H0096:141a-14: chos kyi dbang phyug chos 'chad pa na legs zhes bya ba rab tu byin //
K10D0095_H0096:141a-15: kun tu gzigs pa mthong nas phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu brjod //
K10D0095_H0096:141a-16: 'od 'phro chen po'i phung po la ni khyod kyis dga' bas gser phreng gtor //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-0: 'od zer rgyal mtshan la ni kha tshar phul zhing gsal @141b la bal sran gtor //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-1: ye shes tog la mya ngan med pa'i me tog kha lo sgyur la 'jam //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-2: rin chen gtsug tor can la mar me padma ldan la sman yang phul //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-3: thams cad zil gnon mu tig do shal rgya mtsho la ni padma phul //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-4: padma'i snying po la ni bla bre sengge la ni char gding phul //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-5: s'a la'i dbang po rgyal la mar phul me tog rgyas la 'o ma phul //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-6: grags sbyin kunda'i me tog phul te bden pa gzigs la zhal zas phul //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-7: ye shes lhun la lus btud klus byin la ni na bza' dbul ba byas //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-8: rab 'thong gshegs dang tsandan mchog dang 'od ldan la ni tshva spar re //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-9: bkod pa che la padma dbul byas 'od zer rgyal la rin chen phul //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-10: sh'akya thub la spar gang gser phul dbang po'i tog la bstod pa byas //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-11: nyi ma'i zhal la me tog rna rgyan blo gros bzang la gser cod pa na //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-12: klu zil gnon la nor bu phul te rgyal la ras bcos gding ba phul //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-13: sman gyi rgyal la rin chen gdugs phul sengge'i tog la khri gdan phul //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-14: yon tan mchog ldan rin chen dra ba 'od srung la ni glu dbyangs kun //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-15: spos mchog me tog phul zhing 'od 'phro'i tog la rtag tu me tog phul //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-16: mi 'khrugs rgyal la khang brtsegs phul zhing 'jig rten mchod la phreng ba phul //
K10D0095_H0096:141b-17: rgya spos gtsug lag rgyal srid dbul byas rgyal bar dka' la spos kun phul //
K10D0095_H0096:142a-0: sgron ma che la bdag phul @142a *//
K10D0095_H0096:142a-1: padma'i mchog la rgyan rnams dbul ba byas //
K10D0095_H0096:142a-2: chos kyi tog la me tog sna tshogs sgron ma mdzad la autpa la //
K10D0095_H0096:142a-3: mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad gzhan dang gzhan dag byed pa na //
K10D0095_H0096:142a-4: khyod kyis sems can snying po de dag rnams dang gzhan yang sngon chad mchod //
K10D0095_H0096:142a-5: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang ston pa de dag
K10D0095_H0096:142a-6: khyod mchod dran par gyis; ;sems can mgon med mya
K10D0095_H0096:142a-7: ngan gang ba yal bar ma dor mngon par phyung
K10D0095_H0096:142a-8: // mar me mdzad pa mthong ba tsam gyis khyod kyis bzod pa mchog thob ste //
K10D0095_H0096:142a-9: rjes su mthun pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga po nyams pa med pa thob //
K10D0095_H0096:142a-10: de nas rab tu dga' bas bskal pa grangs med 'jig rten khams kun tu //
K10D0095_H0096:142a-11: sangs rgyas dag ni re re la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab byas //
K10D0095_H0096:142a-12: bskal pa dpag med de dag zad gyur sangs rgyas de dag mya ngan 'das //
K10D0095_H0096:142a-13: khyod kyi lus rnams thams cad dang ni de dag ming yang gang du song //
K10D0095_H0096:142a-14: dngos po thams cad tha mar zad pa'i chos te 'dus byas rtag pa med //
K10D0095_H0096:142a-15: 'dod pa rgyal srid longs spyod rtag pa min gyi grong khyer mchog nas byung //
K10D0095_H0096:142a-16: bskal ba zad par 'gyur tshe gzi brjid drag po 'jigs pa'i me 'od ltar //
K10D0095_H0096:142a-17: rga dang na dang 'chi ba mi zad 'jigs pa chen po 'ong bar 'gyur //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-0: dngos po thams cad tha mar zad pa'i chos te 'dus byas rtag @142b pa med //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-1: shin tu sdug bsngal sems can ltos la yon tan ldan pa mngon par phyung //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-2: rgyal po bde ba'i mal na nyal gyur cing //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-3: gang tshe mo tshogs gling bu rgyud gcig dang //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-4: sil snyan sna tshogs sgra yis slong byed pa //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-5: de tshe sil snyan sgra las 'di dag byung //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-6: srid gsum rga dang nad kyi sdug bsngal 'bar //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-7: 'chi me rab 'bar 'di ni mgon med pa //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-8: srid las 'byung la 'gro ba rtag tu rmongs //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-9: bum par chud pas bung ba 'khor ba bzhin //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-10: srid gsum mi brtan ston ka'i sprin dang 'dra //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-11: 'gro ba'i skye 'chi gar la lta dang mtshungs //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-12: 'gro ba'i tshe 'gro nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-13: ri gzar 'bab chu lta bur myur mgyogs 'gro //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-14: srid sred ma rig dbang gis skye bo rnams //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-15: mi dang lha gnas ngan song lam gsum po //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-16: 'gro ba lnga po dag tu mi mkhas 'khor //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-17: dper na rdza mkhan phang lo bskor ba bzhin //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-18: rtag tu gzugs sdug mchog dang sgra snyan dang //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-19: dri zhim ro mchog reg pa bde byed pa //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-20: dus ngan rnyi la 'gro ba 'di dag thogs //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-21: dper na rngon pa'i rnyi la spre'u thogs bzhin //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-22: 'dod pa'i yon tan mya ngan gnod pa mang //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-23: 'jigs bcas rtag tu dgra byed nyon mongs bcas //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-24: ral gri'i so 'dra dug sdong lo ma mtshungs //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-25: ngan skyug snod ltar 'phags pa'i skye bos spangs //
K10D0095_H0096:142b-26: 'dod pa'i yon tan 'jigs bcas nyon mongs bcas //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-2: rtag tu 'jigs pa'i rgyu byed sdug bsngal rtsa //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-3: srid pa'i sred pa'i 'khri shing 'phel bar byed //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-4: ji ltar me 'bar 'obs ni 'jigs bcas pa //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-5: de ltar 'dod 'di 'phags pa'i skye bos rig /
K10D0095_H0096:143a-6: 'dam rdzab che 'dra ral gri gshegs gnas 'dra //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-7: ral gri'i so la sbrang rtsis bskus dang mtshungs //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-8: ji ltar sbrul gyi mgo dang ngan skyug snod //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-9: de ltar 'dod 'di mkhas pa rnams kyis rig /
K10D0095_H0096:143a-10: bya sha kham bu 'dra zhing gsal shing 'dra //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-11: ro la khyi ltar dgra dang bcas pa yin //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-12: 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di dag chu zla 'dra //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-13: gzugs brnyan mtshungs shing brag ca 'dra ba dang //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-14: mig yor 'dra zhing gar la lta 'dra dang //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-15: rmi lam mnyam pa 'phags pas skye bos rig /
K10D0095_H0096:143a-16: 'dod pa'i yon tan skad cig ya ma bral //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-17: sgyu ma smig sgyu 'dra zhing rdzun pa can //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-18: chu bur dbu ba lta bu yang dag min //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-19: yongs su brtags las byung bar mkhas pas rtogs //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-20: na tshod thog mar gzugs mchog 'dzin pa'i tshe //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-21: phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-22: rga na sdug bsngal gzi brjid lus bcom nas //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-23: rnam par spong ste ri dvags klung skam bzhin //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-24: nor 'bru dam pa rdzas mang stobs ldan tshe //
K10D0095_H0096:143a-25: phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-0: nor nyams sdug bsngal bar ni gyur @143b pa'i tshe; ;rnam par spong ste mi yis 'brog stong bzhin //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-1: ji ltar me tog shing dang 'bras bcas shing //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-2: de ltar sbyin 'dod mi la dga' bar byed //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-3: nor nyams rga bas nyen cing sbrang ba na //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-4: de tshe dga' bar mi 'gyur bya rgod bzhin //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-5: rdzas ldan gzugs mchog ldan tshe dpon po bzhin //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-6: phrad na sdug cing dbang po dga' bar byed //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-7: rga na sdug bsngal nyen cing nor zad na //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-8: de tshe 'dod par mi 'gyur 'chi bdag bzhin //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-9: rga bas rga byas na tshod yol gyur na //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-10: sdong po gnam lcags kyis ni bcom pa bzhin //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-11: rga bas khog na 'jigs bcas khang rul 'dra //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-12: rga las byung ba thub pa myur du smros //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-13: bud med skyes pa'i tshogs rnams rga bas skem //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-14: ma lu'i 'khri shing s'a la'i nags stug bzhin //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-15: rga bas brtson 'grus rtsal dang shugs 'phrog ste //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-16: dper na skyes bu 'dam du bying ba bzhin //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-17: rga bas gzugs sdug gzugs ni mi sdug byed //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-18: rga bas gzi brjid 'phrog cing mthu stobs 'phrog /
K10D0095_H0096:143b-19: rga bas bde ba 'phrog cing brnyas par byed //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-20: rga bas 'chi byed rga bas mdangs kyang 'phrog /
K10D0095_H0096:143b-21: nad brgya mang dang nad thibs sdug bsngal gyis //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-22: 'gro ba gtses te mi yis ri dvagas bzhin //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-23: rga dang na bas bcom pa'i 'gro ltos la //
K10D0095_H0096:143b-24: sdug bsngal las ni 'byung ba myur shod cig /
K10D0095_H0096:143b-25: dper na dgun smad rlung dang kha ba che //
K10D0095_H0096:144a-1: shing gel pa nags sman mdangs kyang 'phrog /
K10D0095_H0096:144a-2: de ltar nad 'di 'gro ba'i mdangs 'phrog cing //
K10D0095_H0096:144a-3: dbang po gzugs dang stobs ni nyams par byed //
K10D0095_H0096:144a-4: nor 'bru nor chen tha mar zad par byed //
K10D0095_H0096:144a-5: nad ni rtag tu 'gro ba brnyas par byed //
K10D0095_H0096:144a-6: gnod pa byed cing sdug la sdang par byed //
K10D0095_H0096:144a-7: yongs su gdung byed mkha' las nyi ma bzhin //
K10D0095_H0096:144a-9: phangs shing sdug pa'i skye bo rtag tu 'bral //
K10D0095_H0096:144a-10: phyir mi 'ong zhing 'phrad par 'gyur ma yin //
K10D0095_H0096:144a-11: shing las lo 'bru 'dra zhing klu yi rgyan dang mtshungs //
K10D0095_H0096:144a-12: 'chi ba dbang yod pa dag dbang med byed //
K10D0095_H0096:144a-13: 'chi ba 'phrog byed chu bos shing ded bzhin //
K10D0095_H0096:144a-14: mi ni gnyis min grogs med gcig pur 'gro /
K10D0095_H0096:144a-15: rang las 'bras bu ldan pas dbang yang med; ;'chi bas srog chags brgya phrag mang 'dzin te //
K10D0095_H0096:144a-16: 'byung po'i tshogs la rgya mtsho'i chu srin bzhin //
K10D0095_H0096:144a-17: klu la mkha' lding glang chen sengge 'dra //
